short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed read any website or paragraph with HotGato.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed reading extension right in your browser. Just select some text, right-click, and select HotGato Speed Read. Boom, the whole article will be loaded into the HotGato popup for you to zip through! Perfect for scanning long articles and reviewing documents.
